content: remnant socks i love to knit socks i have knit dozens of pairs of socks i had so many little leftover skeins and balls of beautiful sock yarn and i didn t know what to do with them then i hit on the idea of making ankle socks using whatever color combinations strike my fancy it s so much fun yarn various leftover fingering weight yarns needles us size 2 or size needles you normally use to knit socks cast on 61 stitches being careful not to twist stitches slip the last stitch from the last needle in front of the first stitch on the first needle knit these 2 stitches together you will now have 60 stitches place a marker after this first stitch to show beginning of round knit 10 row of 1x1 ribbing i like to arrange my stitches so that i have 16 sts on needle one 14 sts on needle 2 16 sts on needle 3 and 14 sts on needle 4 but you can work with 15 sts on each needle if you prefer heel set-up at the beginning of the next round knit across the sts on needle 1 slip the sts from needle 4 onto the same needle with the sts on needle 1 30 sts after combining sts turn and work a wrong side by purling back 1 heel flap pattern row 1 right side *slip 1 knit 1 repeat from * across row row 2 slip 1 purl rest of sts across row repeat these 2 row 15 times for a total of 30 row this creates the heel flap turn heel row 1 slip 1 knit 16 k2tog k1 turn row 2 slip 1 purl 5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 slip 1 k6 k2tog k1 turn row 4 slip 1 p7 p2tog p1 turn continue repeating row 3 and 4 adding an additional k or p stitch after the slip 1 until all the side sts are used up end with a purl row 18 sts gusset knit to the center of the heel 9 sts using a spare needle knit across the rest of the heel sts continuing with that same needle pick up 16 sts down the side of the heel flap you will have 25 sts on that needle knit sts on needles 2 and 3 with another needle pick up 16 sts up the side of the heel knit the last half of the heel sts onto needle 4 to complete the round you will have 25 sts on needle one 14 sts on needle 2 16 sts on needle 3 and 25 sts on needle 4 move one stitch from needle 3 to needle 2 so that you have 15 sts on needles 2 and 3 gusset decreases when working the gusset decreases you will decrease every other round until you have 15 sts on each needle for a total of 60 sts round 1 needle 1 knit to the last 3 sts
